Title: Shadowlands
Plot: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.
Tagline: He distanced himself from love as he distanced himself from pain, until one woman got close enough to open his heart to the world.
Stars: Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Julian Fellowes
